content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist from XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need help with a service. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Tom. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm our service availability?
Thanks, Tom. I see that you qualify for our plumbing services at that address. Could you tell me what problem you're experiencing with your plumbing?
I had a leak under the sink, but I think I fixed it myself. So I don’t think I need a service now.
I see. I’m glad to hear you were able to fix it. If you run into any issues later, feel free to reach out. Would you like me to cancel any appointment or help with anything else today?
No, thanks. I changed my mind about scheduling. Appreciate the help though.
reason: Customer changed mind about needing the service.
